title: American_Top_40_1979_November_17th
description:
THIS IS THE LAST THREE HOURS OF A FOUR HOUR BROADCAST. THE FIRST HOUR IS MISSING.

American Top 40 with Casey Kasem aired on radio from July 4, 1970 until August 6, 1988. This rebroadcast is one of many I have recorded from internet radio. A few are incomplete but most are not and I hope you enjoy these as much as I do.

In this broadcast:

Kermit The Frog has a song in the countdown.

The Pina Colada Song moves up 17 positions from last week.

Casey remembers the oldest song lyrics to ever hit the charts.

Casey tells how sweet little Anne Murray used to be a pain in the neck.

One artist in the countdown has hit the top 40 with all fifteen of his first fifteen releases, something no one else has ever done.
